home.summary: Experienced software developer crafting modern web applications. Building scalable solutions with cutting-edge technologies. Passionate about clean code and user experience.

resume.summary: Software Developer with experience in modern web technologies. Skilled in building scalable applications and working with cross-functional teams. Passionate about writing clean, maintainable code.
resume.subtitle: Experienced software developer

bullets: Developed and maintained web applications using React and TypeScript

aiDevelopment.title: AI-Augmented Development
aiDevelopment.description: Using AI tools like Cursor to improve development velocity by ~30% while maintaining high code quality and architectural standards.

coverLetters.proTip: Use these templates as a starting point. For AI-powered customization with specific job descriptions, see the /tools folder in the repo for Cursor-based generation scripts.

instructions.title: Select Template
instructions.description: Choose the industry that best matches the role

instructions.title: AI Polish
instructions.description: Use Cursor to tailor for specific job descriptions

templates.title: Christian Tech
templates.description: For mission-driven organizations in the faith technology space
templates.content:
Dear [Hiring Manager],

I am excited to apply for the [Position] role at [Company]. Your mission resonates deeply with my experience in this space.

[Add your relevant experience and achievements here]

I am particularly drawn to [Company]'s commitment to [specific value/feature]. I would welcome the opportunity to contribute my experience to your team.

Thank you for considering my application. I look forward to discussing how I can contribute to your team.

Sincerely,
Your Name

templates.title: FinTech
templates.description: For financial technology and payment processing companies
templates.content:
Dear [Hiring Manager],

I am writing to express my interest in the [Position] role at [Company]. With experience in [relevant field], I am excited about the opportunity to contribute to your team.

[Add your relevant experience and achievements here]

I am impressed by [Company]'s approach to [specific feature/value]. My background would allow me to contribute immediately while growing with your organization.

I am available to start immediately in a remote capacity and am willing to adjust my work hours to accommodate team timezones. Thank you for your consideration.

Sincerely,
Your Name

templates.title: Healthcare Tech
templates.description: For healthcare systems and medical technology companies
templates.content:
Dear [Hiring Manager],

I am eager to apply for the [Position] role at [Company]. My experience in [relevant field] has prepared me well for this opportunity.

[Add your relevant experience and achievements here]

I understand the importance of reliability, security, and compliance in [industry] systems. My work has shown me how to increase productivity while maintaining rigorous standards.

I am drawn to [Company]'s commitment to [specific value/feature] and would welcome the opportunity to bring my experience to your team.

Thank you for considering my application.

Sincerely,
Your Name

templates.title: General Tech
templates.description: Adaptable template for any technology company
templates.content:
Dear [Hiring Manager],

I am excited to apply for the [Position] role at [Company]. With experience as a software developer, I am confident in my ability to contribute to your team.

Throughout my career, I have:
‚Ä¢ [Add your key achievements and experiences]
‚Ä¢ [Add more relevant points]
‚Ä¢ [Add more relevant points]

My technical expertise spans [your technologies]. I bring both hands-on coding skills and [your strengths] to every role.

I am particularly impressed by [Company]'s [specific value/feature]. I am available to start immediately in a remote capacity and am flexible with timezone accommodations.

Thank you for your consideration. I look forward to discussing how I can contribute to your success.

Sincerely,
Your Name
